Poio API Module - graid_clauseunit.py¶

This document is to create the regions of the words in the clause units one by one.

class graid_clauseunit.CreateClauseUnitsFile(filepath)[source]¶

Class responsible to retrieve the clause units from the Annotation Tree.

The data hierarchy set in the Annotation Tree must be the GRAID hierarchy.

Methods

create_clause_units_file()[source]¶

Creates an xml file with all the clause units of the Annotation Tree file.

See also

poioapi.data
Here you can find more about the data

hierarchies.
